title: Lost.Planet.3.Steam.Rip.[Multi 9]
description:
Lost.Planet.3.Steam.Rip.[Multi 9] 

Year: 2013 
Genre: Action / 3rd Person 
Language:English [Multi 9] 
Crack: Present (SKIDROW)

System requirements

Operating system: Windows XP SP3, Vista SP1, Windows 7 
Processor: Dual core CPU 2.5 GHz 
RAM: 3Gb 
Video Card: NVIDIA  GeForce  9800 or better, ATI Radeon  HD 4770 or better 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free space on hard drive: 25Gb

Dangerous and unpredictable situation - a proprietary feature of all games in the series Lost Planet, but now the player waiting for the most severe test! Lost Planet 3, dedicated to the history of colonization E.D.N. III, reveals new secrets sinister planet. 

Lost Planet Hero 3 - pilot Jim Peyton, who took a risky but profitable business proposition of "Neo Venus Constructions" (NEVEK). Taking off from the Earth to the planet E.D.N. III, which the company prepares to colonization, Jim joins fellow trailblazers based Koronis. There he begins investigating the site and collecting samples of thermal energy component of the energy supply of the planet. 

Since the thermal energy reserves NEVEK coming to an end, the fate of the mission on Koronis depends on its ability to extract energy from any natural source found. Jim understands that this is a great chance to get a huge reward and go home prematurely. The pilot decided to challenge the insidious planet and aggressive local race of locusts. 

Jim machine - a "home away from home area." It stores a set of tools, essential field. Without a car, Jim would have lost not only work, but also life - housing protects the pilot from the vagaries of climate. 

Lost Planet 3 combines different styles of play, including hiking battles and intense fighting in the first person. The game has several modes of multiplayer games and mesmerizing story for one player. Lost Planet 3 will allow you to dive deeper into the world of Lost Planet, and uncover the secrets of E.D.N. III. Uniquely dynamic environment.

Features of release:

2.Run setup.exe

5.Play! enjoy...
